channel.title: jsonschema Eğitimi on
channel.description: Recent content in jsonschema Eğitimi on

item.title: jsonschema'yı kullanmaya başlama
item.description: Temel örnek doğrulama şeması # { "title": "Person", "type": "object", "properties": { "firstName": { "type": "string" }, "lastName": { "type": "string" }, "age": { "description": "Age in years", "type": "integer", "minimum": 0 } }, "required": ["firstName", "lastName"] } Sonuçlar // Valid { "firstName": "Jason", "lastName": "Voorhees" } // Valid { "firstName": "Jason", "lastName": "Voorhees", "age": 47 } // Invalid - no lastName { "firstName": "Jason", "age": 47 } // Invalid - age is not integer { "firstName": "Jason", "lastName": "Voorhees", "age": "47" }
